Places to Stay
==============

**Sleep Inn/Mainstay, Lancaster**  
3508 I-35E Building A, Lancaster, TX 75134  
[(469) 993-2045](https://www.google.com/search?q=mainstay+sleep+inn+lancaster+tx&rlz=1C1GCEU_enUS1041US1041&oq=sleep+inn+main+stay+lan&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUqCggBEAAYCBgNGB4yBggAEEUYOTIKCAEQABgIGA0YHjIKCAIQABgIGA0YHjIKCAMQABiGAxiKBTIKCAQQABiGAxiKBTIKCAUQABiGAxiKBdIBCDkxMThqMWo3qAIAsAIA&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#)  
[Visit Website](https://www.hotelplanner.com/Hotels/333532/Reservations-Sleep-Inn-Mainstay-Suites-Lancaster-3508-I-35e-75134#HotelName)

**Red Roof Inn, Lancaster**  
2514 Balomede Ave., Lancaster, TX 75134  
(214-200-3971)  
[Visit Website](https://www.redroof.com/property/tx/lancaster/RRI1225)

**Spanish Trails Inn, Lancaster**  
1420 N. Interstate 35 E. Lancaster, TX 75134  
[Visit Website](https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g56133-d647560-Reviews-Spanish_Trails_Inn-Lancaster_Texas.html)

**Motel 6 Lancaster, TX -Lancaster- DeSoto**  
1750 N Interstate 35 E Rd, Lancaster, TX 75134  
(972) 228-1255  
[Visit Website](https://hiltongardeninn3.hilton.com/en/hotels/texas/hilton-garden-inn-dallas-duncanville-DALDUGI/index.html)

8.9 miles to Lancaster  
866-538-0294
